description: The Eventbrite API is the best way to integrate and extend Eventbrite for your event or organising needs.

blocks.name: getCategories
blocks.description: Returns a list of category as categories, including subcategories nested.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

blocks.name: getSingleCategory
blocks.description: Gets a category by ID as category.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: categoryId
args.info: Required: The ID of the category.

blocks.name: getSubcategories
blocks.description: Returns a list of subcategory as subcategories.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

blocks.name: getSingleSubcategory
blocks.description: Gets a subcategory by ID as subcategory.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: subcategoryId
args.info: Required: The ID of the subcategory.

blocks.name: getFormats
blocks.description: Returns a list of format as formats.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

blocks.name: getSingleFormat
blocks.description: Gets a format by ID as format.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: formatId
args.info: Required: The ID of the format.

blocks.name: getMedia
blocks.description: Return an image for a given id.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: mediaId
args.info: Required: The ID of the media.

blocks.name: uploadMedia
blocks.description: Upload media.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: type
args.info: Required: The type of image to upload (Valid choices are: image-event-logo, image-event-view-from-seat, image-organizer-logo, image-user-photo, or image-structured-content).

args.name: file
args.info: Required: The file to upload.

args.name: cropTopLeftX
args.info: Optional: X coordinate for top-left corner of crop mask.

args.name: cropTopLeftY
args.info: Optional: Y coordinate for top-left corner of crop mask.

args.name: cropWidth
args.info: Optional: Crop mask width.

args.name: cropHeight
args.info: Optional: Crop mask height.

blocks.name: getSalesReport
blocks.description: Returns a response of the aggregate sales data.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventIds
args.info: Required: List of public event IDs to report on.

args.name: eventStatus
args.info: Optional: Event status to filter down results by (Valid choices are: all, live, or ended).

args.name: startDate
args.info: Optional: Optional start date to query.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Optional: Optional end date to query.

args.name: period
args.info: Optional: Time period to provide aggregation for in units of the selected dateFacet. For example, if dateFacet=hour, then period=3 returns 3 hours worth of data from the current time in the event timezone. Day is the default choice if no dateFacet.

args.name: filterBy
args.info: Optional: Optional filters for sales/attendees data formatted as: {“ticket_ids”: [1234, 5678], “countries”: [“US”],...}

args.name: groupBy
args.info: Optional: Optional field to group data on (Valid choices are: payment_method, payment_method_application, ticket, ticket_application, currency, event_currency, reservedSection, event, event_ticket, event_application, country, city, state, or source).

args.name: dateFacet
args.info: Optional: Optional date aggregation level to return data for. Day is the default choice. Monthly aggregation is represented by the first of the month. Weekly aggregation is represented by the ending Sunday of the week, where a week is defined as Monday-Sunday. (Valid choices are: hour, day, week, month, year, or none).

args.name: timezone
args.info: Optional: Optional timezone. If unspecified picks the TZ of the first event.

args.name: randomSeed
args.info: Optional: Random seed for dataset (default = 0). Aids in determinism.

blocks.name: getAttendeesReport
blocks.description: Returns a response of the aggregate attendees data.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventIds
args.info: Required: List of public event IDs to report on.

args.name: eventStatus
args.info: Optional: Event status to filter down results by (Valid choices are: all, live, or ended).

args.name: startDate
args.info: Optional: Optional start date to query.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Optional: Optional end date to query.

args.name: period
args.info: Optional: Time period to provide aggregation for in units of the selected dateFacet. For example, if dateFacet=hour, then period=3 returns 3 hours worth of data from the current time in the event timezone. Day is the default choice if no dateFacet.

args.name: filterBy
args.info: Optional: Optional filters for sales/attendees data formatted as: {“ticket_ids”: [1234, 5678], “countries”: [“US”],...}

args.name: groupBy
args.info: Optional: Optional field to group data on (Valid choices are: payment_method, payment_method_application, ticket, ticket_application, currency, event_currency, reservedSection, event, event_ticket, event_application, country, city, state, or source).

args.name: dateFacet
args.info: Optional: Optional date aggregation level to return data for. Day is the default choice. Monthly aggregation is represented by the first of the month. Weekly aggregation is represented by the ending Sunday of the week, where a week is defined as Monday-Sunday. (Valid choices are: hour, day, week, month, year, or none).

args.name: timezone
args.info: Optional: Optional timezone. If unspecified picks the TZ of the first event.

args.name: randomSeed
args.info: Optional: Random seed for dataset (default = 0). Aids in determinism.

blocks.name: getTimezones
blocks.description: Returns a response with a key of timezones, containing a list of timezones.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

blocks.name: getRegions
blocks.description: Returns a single page response with a key of regions, containing a list of regions.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

blocks.name: getCountries
blocks.description: Returns a single page response with a key of countries, containing a list of countries.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

blocks.name: createOrganizer
blocks.description: Makes a new organizer. Returns an organizer as organizer.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: organizerName
args.info: Required: The name of the organizer

args.name: organizerDescription
args.info: Optional: The description of the organizer

args.name: organizerLongDescription
args.info: Optional: The long description of the organizer

args.name: organizerLogoId
args.info: Optional: The logo id of the organizer

args.name: organizerWebsite
args.info: Optional: The website for the organizer

args.name: organizerTwitter
args.info: Optional: The Twitter handle for the organizer

args.name: organizerFacebook
args.info: Optional: The Facebook URL ID for the organizer

args.name: organizerInstagram
args.info: Optional: The Instagram numeric ID for the organizer

blocks.name: updateOrganizer
blocks.description: Updates an organizer and returns it as as organizer.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: organizerId
args.info: Required: The id of the organizer

args.name: organizerName
args.info: Required: The name of the organizer

args.name: organizerDescription
args.info: Optional: The description of the organizer

args.name: organizerLongDescription
args.info: Optional: The long description of the organizer

args.name: organizerLogoId
args.info: Optional: The logo id of the organizer

args.name: organizerWebsite
args.info: Optional: The website for the organizer

args.name: organizerTwitter
args.info: Optional: The Twitter handle for the organizer

args.name: organizerFacebook
args.info: Optional: The Facebook URL ID for the organizer

args.name: organizerInstagram
args.info: Optional: The Instagram numeric ID for the organizer

blocks.name: getOrganizer
blocks.description: Gets an organizer by ID as organizer.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: organizerId
args.info: Required: The id of the organizer

blocks.name: getOrganizerEvents
blocks.description: Gets events of the organizer.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: organizerId
args.info: Required: The id of the organizer

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: Only return events with a specific status set. This should be a comma delimited string of status. Valid status: all, draft, live, canceled, started, ended.

args.name: orderBy
args.info: Optional: How to order the results (Valid choices are: start_asc, start_desc, created_asc, or created_desc).

args.name: startRangeDate
args.info: Optional: Only return events with start dates after the given date.

args.name: endRangeDate
args.info: Optional: Only return events with start dates before the given date.

args.name: onlyPublic
args.info: Optional: Only show public events even if viewing your own events. True or false.

blocks.name: getVenue
blocks.description: Returns a venue object.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: venueId
args.info: Required: The id of the venue.

blocks.name: updateVenue
blocks.description: Updates a venue and returns it as an object.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: venueId
args.info: Required: The id of the venue.

args.name: venueName
args.info: Optional: The name of the venue.

args.name: venueAddressLatitude
args.info: Optional: The latitude of the coordinates for the venue.

args.name: venueAddressLongitude
args.info: Optional: The longitude of the coordinates for the venue.

args.name: venueOrganizerId
args.info: Optional: The organizer this venue belongs to (optional - leave this off to use the default organizer).

args.name: venueAddress1
args.info: Optional: The first line of the address.

args.name: venueAddress2
args.info: Optional: The second line of the address.

args.name: venueCity
args.info: Optional: The city where the venue is.

args.name: venueRegion
args.info: Optional: The region where the venue is.

args.name: venuePostalCode
args.info: Optional: The postal code where the venue is.

args.name: venueCountry
args.info: Optional: The country where the venue is.

blocks.name: createVenue
blocks.description: Creates a new venue with associated address.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: venueName
args.info: Required: The name of the venue.

args.name: venueAddressLatitude
args.info: Optional: The latitude of the coordinates for the venue.

args.name: venueAddressLongitude
args.info: Optional: The longitude of the coordinates for the venue.

args.name: venueOrganizerId
args.info: Optional: The organizer this venue belongs to (optional - leave this off to use the default organizer).

args.name: venueAddress1
args.info: Optional: The first line of the address.

args.name: venueAddress2
args.info: Optional: The second line of the address.

args.name: venueCity
args.info: Optional: The city where the venue is.

args.name: venueRegion
args.info: Optional: The region where the venue is.

args.name: venuePostalCode
args.info: Optional: The postal code where the venue is.

args.name: venueCountry
args.info: Optional: The country where the venue is.

blocks.name: getVenueEvents
blocks.description: Returns events of a given venue.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: venueId
args.info: Required: The ID of the venue.

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: Only return events with a specific status set. This should be a comma delimited string of status. Valid status: all, draft, live, canceled, started, ended.

args.name: orderBy
args.info: Optional: How to order the results (Valid choices are: start_asc, start_desc, created_asc, or created_desc).

args.name: startRangeDate
args.info: Optional: Only return events with start dates after the given date.

args.name: endRangeDate
args.info: Optional: Only return events with start dates before the given date.

args.name: onlyPublic
args.info: Optional: Only show public events even if viewing your own events.

blocks.name: getSingleWebhook
blocks.description: Returns a webhook for the specified webhook as webhook.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: webhookId
args.info: Required: The ID of the webhook.

blocks.name: createWebhook
blocks.description: Creates a webhook for the authenticated user.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: endpointUrl
args.info: Required: The target URL of the Webhook subscription.

args.name: actions
args.info: Optional: Determines what actions will trigger the webhook. If no value is sent for this param, it selects order.placed, event.published, and event.unpublished by default.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Optional: The ID of the event that triggers this webhook. Leave blank for all events.

blocks.name: getWebhooks
blocks.description: Returns the list of webhook objects that belong to the authenticated user.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

blocks.name: deleteWebhook
blocks.description: Deletes the specified webhook object.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: webhookId
args.info: Required: The ID of the webhook.

blocks.name: getUser
blocks.description: Returns a user for the specified user as user.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

blocks.name: getUserOrders
blocks.description: Returns a user for the specified user as user.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: changedSince
args.info: Optional: Only return resource changed on or after the time given.

args.name: timeFilter
args.info: Optional: Limits results to either past or current & future events / orders. (Valid choices are: all, past, or current_future).

blocks.name: getUserVenues
blocks.description: Returns a response of venue objects that are owned by the user.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

blocks.name: getUserOrganizers
blocks.description: Returns a response of organizer objects that are owned by the user.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

blocks.name: getUserOwnedEvents
blocks.description: Returns a response of events, under the key events, of all events the user owns (i.e. events they are organising).

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: orderBy
args.info: Optional: How to order the results (Valid choices are: start_asc, start_desc, created_asc, or created_desc).

args.name: showSeriesParent
args.info: Optional: True: Will show parent of a serie instead of children False: Will show children of a serie (Default value).

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: Filter by events with a specific status set. This should be a comma delimited string of status. Valid status: all, draft, live, canceled, started, ended.

blocks.name: getUserEvents
blocks.description: Returns a response of events, under the key events, of all events the user has access to.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: nameFilter
args.info: Optional: Filter event results by name.

args.name: orderBy
args.info: Optional: How to order the results (Valid choices are: start_asc, start_desc, created_asc, or created_desc).

args.name: showSeriesParent
args.info: Optional: True: Will show parent of a serie instead of children False: Will show children of a serie (Default value).

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: Filter by events with a specific status set. This should be a comma delimited string of status. Valid status: all, draft, live, canceled, started, ended.

args.name: eventGroupId
args.info: Optional: Filter event results by eventGroupId

blocks.name: getUserOwnedEventAttendees
blocks.description: Returns a response of attendees, under the key attendees, of attendees visiting any of the events the user owns.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: Limits results to either confirmed attendees or cancelled/refunded/etc. attendees (Valid choices are: attending, or not_attending).

args.name: changedSince
args.info: Optional: Only return resource changed on or after the time given.

blocks.name: getUserOwnedEventOrders
blocks.description: Returns a response of orders, under the key orders, of orders placed against any of the events the user owns.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: Filter to active (attending), inactive (not attending), or all (both) orders (Valid choices are: active, inactive, or all).

args.name: onlyEmails
args.info: Optional: Only include orders placed by one of these emails.

args.name: excludeEmails
args.info: Optional: Don’t include orders placed by any of these emails.

args.name: changedSince
args.info: Optional: Only return resource changed on or after the time given.

blocks.name: getUserContactLists
blocks.description: Returns a list of contact_list that the user owns as the key contact_lists.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

blocks.name: createUserContactList
blocks.description: Makes a new contact_list for the user and returns it as contact_list.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: contactListName
args.info: Required: Name of the new contact list.

blocks.name: updateContactList
blocks.description: Updates the contact_list and returns it as contact_list.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: contactListId
args.info: Required: The ID of the contact list.

args.name: contactListName
args.info: Required: Name of the new contact list.

blocks.name: deleteUserContactList
blocks.description: Deletes the contact list. Returns {"deleted": true}.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: contactListId
args.info: Required: The ID of the contact list.

blocks.name: getContactListContacts
blocks.description: Returns the contacts on the contact list as contacts.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: contactListId
args.info: Required: The ID of the contact list.

blocks.name: addContactToContactList
blocks.description: Adds a new contact to the contact list. Returns {"created": true}. There is no way to update entries in the list; just delete the old one and add the updated version.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: contactListId
args.info: Required: The ID of the contact list.

args.name: contactEmail
args.info: Required: Contact email address.

args.name: contactFirstName
args.info: Optional: Contact first name (or full name).

args.name: contactLastName
args.info: Optional: Contact last name.

blocks.name: deleteContactFromContactList
blocks.description: Deletes the specified contact from the contact list. Returns {"deleted": true}.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: contactListId
args.info: Required: The ID of the contact list.

args.name: email
args.info: Required: Contact email address.

blocks.name: getUserBookmarks
blocks.description: Gets all the user’s saved events. In order to update the saved events list, the user must unsave or save each event. A user is authorized to only see his/her saved events.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: bookmarkListId
args.info: Optional: Optional bookmark list id to fetch all bookmarks from.

blocks.name: createBookmark
blocks.description: Adds a new bookmark for the user. Returns {"created": true}. A user is only authorized to save his/her own events.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Optional: Event id to bookmark for the user.

args.name: eventIds
args.info: Optional: Event ids to batch bookmark for the user.

args.name: bookmarkListId
args.info: Optional: Optional Bookmark list id to save the bookmark(s) to.

blocks.name: deleteBookmark
blocks.description: Removes the specified bookmark from the event for the user. Returns {"deleted": true}. A user is only authorized to unsave his/her own events.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: userId
args.info: Required: The ID of the user. If you want to get details about the currently authenticated user, use "me" value.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Optional: Event id to bookmark for the user.

args.name: eventIds
args.info: Optional: Event ids to batch bookmark for the user.

args.name: bookmarkListId
args.info: Optional: Optional Bookmark list id to save the bookmark(s) to.

blocks.name: createEventSeries
blocks.description: Creates a new repeating event series. The POST data must include information for at least one event date in the series.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: seriesParentName
args.info: Required: The name of the event.

args.name: seriesParentDescription
args.info: Optional: The description on the event page.

args.name: seriesParentOrganizerId
args.info: Optional: The ID of the organizer of this event.

args.name: seriesParentStartUtc
args.info: Required: The start time of the event.

args.name: seriesParentStartTimezone
args.info: Required: Start time timezone (Olson format).

args.name: seriesParentEndUtc
args.info: Required: The end time of the event.

args.name: seriesParentEndTimezone
args.info: Required: End time timezone (Olson format).

args.name: seriesParentHideStartDate
args.info: Optional: Whether the start date should be hidden. True or false.

args.name: seriesParentHideEndDate
args.info: Optional: Whether the end date should be hidden. True or false.

args.name: seriesParentCurrency
args.info: Required: Event currency (3 letter code).

args.name: seriesParentVenueId
args.info: Optional: ID of the venue.

args.name: seriesParentOnlineEvent
args.info: Optional: Is the event online-only (no venue)?. True or false.

args.name: seriesParentListed
args.info: Optional: If the event is publicly listed and searchable. Defaults to true.

args.name: seriesParentLogoId
args.info: Optional: The logo for the event.

args.name: seriesParentCategoryId
args.info: Optional: The category (vertical) of the event.

args.name: seriesParentSubcategoryId
args.info: Optional: The subcategory of the event (US only).

args.name: seriesParentFormatId
args.info: Optional: The format (general type) of the event.

args.name: seriesParentShareable
args.info: Optional: If users can share the event on social media.

args.name: seriesParentInviteOnly
args.info: Optional: Only invited users can see the event page.

args.name: seriesParentPassword
args.info: Optional: Password needed to see the event in unlisted mode.

args.name: seriesParentCapacity
args.info: Optional: Set specific capacity (if omitted, sums ticket capacities).

args.name: seriesParentShowRemaining
args.info: Optional: If the remaining number of tickets is publicly visible on the event page.

args.name: createChildren
args.info: Required: A list of dates for which child events should be created. In the format: [{ "start": { "utc": "2015-06-15T12:00:00Z", "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles" }, "end": { "utc": "2015-06-15T13:00:00Z", "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles" } }, { ... }, ...]

args.name: updateChildren
args.info: Optional: A map of event IDs to modified date objects for updating child events.

args.name: deleteChildren
args.info: Optional: A list of IDs for child events that should be deleted. In the format: 1234,5678,9012

blocks.name: getEventSerie
blocks.description: Returns a repeating event series parent object for the specified repeating event series.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: serieId
args.info: Required: The Id of the serie.

args.name: trackingСode
args.info: Optional: Append the given tracking_code to the event URLs returned.

blocks.name: changeEventSerie
blocks.description: Updates a repeating event series parent object, and optionally also creates more event dates or updates or deletes existing event dates in the series. In order for a series date to be deleted or updated, there must be no pending or completed orders for that date.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: serieId
args.info: Required: The Id of the serie.

args.name: seriesParentName
args.info: Required: The name of the event.

args.name: seriesParentDescription
args.info: Optional: The description on the event page.

args.name: seriesParentOrganizerId
args.info: Optional: The ID of the organizer of this event.

args.name: seriesParentStartUtc
args.info: Required: The start time of the event.

args.name: seriesParentStartTimezone
args.info: Required: Start time timezone (Olson format).

args.name: seriesParentEndUtc
args.info: Required: The end time of the event.

args.name: seriesParentEndTimezone
args.info: Required: End time timezone (Olson format).

args.name: seriesParentHideStartDate
args.info: Optional: Whether the start date should be hidden. True or false.

args.name: seriesParentHideEndDate
args.info: Optional: Whether the end date should be hidden. True or false.

args.name: seriesParentCurrency
args.info: Required: Event currency (3 letter code).

args.name: seriesParentVenueId
args.info: Optional: ID of the venue.

args.name: seriesParentOnlineEvent
args.info: Optional: Is the event online-only (no venue)?. True or false.

args.name: seriesParentListed
args.info: Optional: If the event is publicly listed and searchable. Defaults to true.

args.name: seriesParentLogoId
args.info: Optional: The logo for the event.

args.name: seriesParentCategoryId
args.info: Optional: The category (vertical) of the event.

args.name: seriesParentSubcategoryId
args.info: Optional: The subcategory of the event (US only).

args.name: seriesParentFormatId
args.info: Optional: The format (general type) of the event.

args.name: seriesParentShareable
args.info: Optional: If users can share the event on social media.

args.name: seriesParentInviteOnly
args.info: Optional: Only invited users can see the event page.

args.name: seriesParentPassword
args.info: Optional: Password needed to see the event in unlisted mode.

args.name: seriesParentCapacity
args.info: Optional: Set specific capacity (if omitted, sums ticket capacities).

args.name: seriesParentShowRemaining
args.info: Optional: If the remaining number of tickets is publicly visible on the event page.

args.name: createChildren
args.info: Required: A list of dates for which child events should be created. In the format: [{ "start": { "utc": "2015-06-15T12:00:00Z", "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles" }, "end": { "utc": "2015-06-15T13:00:00Z", "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles" } }, { ... }, ...]

args.name: updateChildren
args.info: Optional: A map of event IDs to modified date objects for updating child events.

args.name: deleteChildren
args.info: Optional: A list of IDs for child events that should be deleted. In the format: 1234,5678,9012

blocks.name: publishEventSerie
blocks.description: Publishes a repeating event series and all of its occurrences that are not already canceled or deleted. Once a date is cancelled it can still be uncancelled and can be viewed by the public. A deleted date cannot be undeleted and cannot by viewed by the public. In order for publish to be permitted, the event must have all necessary information, including a name and description, an organizer, at least one ticket, and valid payment options.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: serieId
args.info: Required: The Id of the serie.

blocks.name: unpublishEventSerie
blocks.description: Unpublishes a repeating event series and all of its occurrences that are not already completed, canceled, or deleted. In order for a free series to be unpublished, it must not have any pending or completed orders for any dates, even past dates. In order for a paid series to be unpublished, it must not have any pending or completed orders for any dates, except that completed orders for past dates that have been completed and paid out do not prevent an unpublish. Returns a boolean indicating success or failure of the unpublish.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: serieId
args.info: Required: The Id of the serie.

blocks.name: cancelEventSerie
blocks.description: Cancels a repeating event series and all of its occurrences that are not already canceled or deleted. In order for cancel to be permitted, there must be no pending or completed orders for any dates in the series. Returns a boolean indicating success or failure of the cancel.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: serieId
args.info: Required: The Id of the serie.

blocks.name: deleteEventSerie
blocks.description: Deletes a repeating event series and all of its occurrences if the delete is permitted. In order for a delete to be permitted, there must be no pending or completed orders for any dates in the series. Returns a boolean indicating success or failure of the delete.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: serieId
args.info: Required: The Id of the serie.

blocks.name: getSignleEventFromSerieEvents
blocks.description: Returns all of the events that belong to this repeating event series.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: serieId
args.info: Required: The Id of the serie.

args.name: timeFilter
args.info: Optional: Limits results to either past or current & future events. (Valid choices are: all, past, or current_future).

args.name: trackingCode
args.info: Optional: Append the given tracking_code to the event URLs returned.

args.name: orderBy
args.info: Optional: How to order the results (Valid choices are: start_asc, start_desc, created_asc, or created_desc)

blocks.name: addSingleEventInSerieEvents
blocks.description: Creates more event dates in a repeating event series.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: serieId
args.info: Required: The Id of the serie.

args.name: addChildren
args.info: Required: A list of dates for which child events should be created. In the format: [{ "start": { "utc": "2015-06-15T12:00:00Z", "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles" }, "end": { "utc": "2015-06-15T13:00:00Z", "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles" } }, { ... }, ...]

blocks.name: deleteSingleEventInSerieEvents
blocks.description: Deletes existing event dates in a repeating event series. In order for a series date to be deleted, there must be no pending or completed orders for that date.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: serieId
args.info: Required: The Id of the serie.

args.name: deleteChildren
args.info: Required: A list of IDs for child events that should be deleted. In the format: 1234,5678,9012

blocks.name: searchEvent
blocks.description: Allows you to retrieve a response of public event objects from across Eventbrite’s directory, regardless of which user owns the event.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: q
args.info: Optional: Return events matching the given keywords. This parameter will accept any string as a keyword.

args.name: sortBy
args.info: Optional: Parameter you want to sort by - options are “date”, “distance” and “best”. Prefix with a hyphen to reverse the order, e.g. “-date”.

args.name: locationAddress
args.info: Optional: The address of the location you want to search for events around.

args.name: locationWithin
args.info: Optional: The distance you want to search around the given location. This should be an integer followed by “mi” or “km”.

args.name: locationLatitude
args.info: Optional: The latitude of of the location you want to search for events around.

args.name: locationLongitude
args.info: Optional: The longitude of the location you want to search for events around.

args.name: locationViewportNortheastLatitude
args.info: Optional: The latitude of the northeast corner of a viewport.

args.name: locationViewportNortheastLongitude
args.info: Optional: The longitude of the northeast corner of a viewport.

args.name: locationViewportSouthwestLatitude
args.info: Optional: The latitude of the southwest corner of a viewport.

args.name: locationViewportSouthwestLongitude
args.info: Optional: The longitude of the southwest corner of a viewport.

args.name: organizerId
args.info: Optional: Only return events organized by the given Organizer ID.

args.name: userId
args.info: Optional: Only return events owned by the given User ID.

args.name: trackingCode
args.info: Optional: Append the given tracking_code to the event URLs returned.

args.name: categories
args.info: Optional: Only return events under the given category IDs. This should be a comma delimited string of category IDs.

args.name: subcategories
args.info: Optional: Only return events under the given subcategory IDs. This should be a comma delimited string of subcategory IDs.

args.name: formats
args.info: Optional: Only return events with the given format IDs. This should be a comma delimited string of format IDs.

args.name: price
args.info: Optional: Only return events that are “free” or “paid”

args.name: DateRangeStart
args.info: Optional: Only return events with start dates after the given date.

args.name: DateRangeEnd
args.info: Optional: Only return events with start dates before the given date.

args.name: startDateKeyword
args.info: Optional: Only return events with start dates within the given keyword date range. Keyword options are “this_week”, “next_week”, “this_weekend”, “next_month”, “this_month”, “tomorrow”, “today”

args.name: ModifiedRangeStart
args.info: Optional: Only return events with modified dates after the given UTC date.

args.name: ModifiedRangeEnd
args.info: Optional: Only return events with modified dates before the given UTC date.

args.name: ModifiedKeyword
args.info: Optional: Only return events with modified dates within the given keyword date range. Keyword options are “this_week”, “next_week”, “this_weekend”, “next_month”, “this_month”, “tomorrow”, “today”

args.name: searchType
args.info: Optional: Use the preconfigured settings for this type of search - Current option is “promoted”

args.name: includeAllSeriesInstances
args.info: Optional: Boolean for whether or not you want to see all instances of repeating events in search results.

args.name: includeUnavailableEvents
args.info: Optional: Boolean for whether or not you want to see events without tickets on sale.

args.name: incorporateUserAffinities
args.info: Optional: Incorporate additional information from the user’s historic preferences.

args.name: highAffinityCategories
args.info: Optional: Make search results prefer events in these categories. This should be a comma delimited string of category IDs.

blocks.name: createEvent
blocks.description: Makes a new event, and returns an event for the specified event. Does not support the creation of repeating event series.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventName
args.info: Required: The name of the event. Value cannot be empty nor whitespace.

args.name: eventDescription
args.info: Optional: The description on the event page.

args.name: eventOrganizerId
args.info: Optional: The ID of the organizer of this event.

args.name: eventStartUtc
args.info: Required: The start time of the event.

args.name: eventStartTimezone
args.info: Required: Start time timezone (Olson format).

args.name: eventEndUtc
args.info: Required: The end time of the event.

args.name: eventEndTimezone
args.info: Required: End time timezone (Olson format).

args.name: eventHideStartDate
args.info: Optional: Whether the start date should be hidden.

args.name: eventHideEndDate
args.info: Optional: Whether the end date should be hidden.

args.name: eventCurrency
args.info: Required: Event currency (3 letter code).

args.name: eventVenueId
args.info: Optional: The ID of a previously-created venue to associate with this event. You can omit this field or set it to null if you set online_event.

args.name: eventOnlineEvent
args.info: Optional: Is the event online-only (no venue).

args.name: eventListed
args.info: Optional: If the event is publicly listed and searchable. Defaults to True.

args.name: eventLogoId
args.info: Optional: The logo for the event.

args.name: eventCategoryId
args.info: Optional: The category (vertical) of the event.

args.name: eventSubcategoryId
args.info: Optional: The subcategory of the event (US only).

args.name: eventFormatId
args.info: Optional: The format (general type) of the event.

args.name: eventShareable
args.info: Optional: If users can share the event on social media.

args.name: eventInviteOnly
args.info: Optional: Only invited users can see the event page.

args.name: eventPassword
args.info: Optional: Password needed to see the event in unlisted mode.

args.name: eventCapacity
args.info: Optional: Set specific capacity (if omitted, sums ticket capacities).

args.name: eventShowRemaining
args.info: Optional: If the remaining number of tickets is publicly visible on the event page.

args.name: eventSource
args.info: Optional: Source of the event (defaults to API).

blocks.name: getEventById
blocks.description: Returns an event for the specified event. Many of Eventbrite’s API use cases revolve around pulling details of a specific event within an Eventbrite account. Does not support fetching a repeating event series parent.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

blocks.name: updateEvent
blocks.description: Updates an event. Returns an event for the specified event. Does not support updating a repeating event series parent

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: eventName
args.info: Required: The name of the event. Value cannot be empty nor whitespace.

args.name: eventDescription
args.info: Optional: The description on the event page.

args.name: eventOrganizerId
args.info: Optional: The ID of the organizer of this event.

args.name: eventStartUtc
args.info: Required: The start time of the event.

args.name: eventStartTimezone
args.info: Required: Start time timezone (Olson format).

args.name: eventEndUtc
args.info: Required: The end time of the event.

args.name: eventEndTimezone
args.info: Required: End time timezone (Olson format).

args.name: eventHideStartDate
args.info: Optional: Whether the start date should be hidden.

args.name: eventHideEndDate
args.info: Optional: Whether the end date should be hidden.

args.name: eventCurrency
args.info: Required: Event currency (3 letter code).

args.name: eventVenueId
args.info: Optional: The ID of a previously-created venue to associate with this event. You can omit this field or set it to null if you set online_event.

args.name: eventOnlineEvent
args.info: Optional: Is the event online-only (no venue).

args.name: eventListed
args.info: Optional: If the event is publicly listed and searchable. Defaults to True.

args.name: eventLogoId
args.info: Optional: The logo for the event.

args.name: eventCategoryId
args.info: Optional: The category (vertical) of the event.

args.name: eventSubcategoryId
args.info: Optional: The subcategory of the event (US only).

args.name: eventFormatId
args.info: Optional: The format (general type) of the event.

args.name: eventShareable
args.info: Optional: If users can share the event on social media.

args.name: eventInviteOnly
args.info: Optional: Only invited users can see the event page.

args.name: eventPassword
args.info: Optional: Password needed to see the event in unlisted mode.

args.name: eventCapacity
args.info: Optional: Set specific capacity (if omitted, sums ticket capacities).

args.name: eventShowRemaining
args.info: Optional: If the remaining number of tickets is publicly visible on the event page.

args.name: eventSource
args.info: Optional: Source of the event (defaults to API).

blocks.name: publishEvent
blocks.description: Publishes an event if it has not already been deleted. In order for publish to be permitted, the event must have all necessary information, including a name and description, an organizer, at least one ticket, and valid payment options. This API endpoint will return argument errors for event fields that fail to validate the publish requirements. Returns a boolean indicating success or failure of the publish.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

blocks.name: unpublishEvent
blocks.description: Unpublishes an event. In order for a free event to be unpublished, it must not have any pending or completed orders, even if the event is in the past. In order for a paid event to be unpublished, it must not have any pending or completed orders, unless the event has been completed and paid out. Returns a boolean indicating success or failure of the unpublish.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

blocks.name: cancelEvent
blocks.description: Cancels an event if it has not already been deleted. In order for cancel to be permitted, there must be no pending or completed orders. Returns a boolean indicating success or failure of the cancel.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

blocks.name: deleteEvent
blocks.description: Deletes an event if the delete is permitted. In order for a delete to be permitted, there must be no pending or completed orders. Returns a boolean indicating success or failure of the delete.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

blocks.name: getEventDisplaySettings
blocks.description: Retrieves the display settings for an event.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

blocks.name: updateEventDisplaySettings
blocks.description: Updates the display settings for an event.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: showStartDate
args.info: Optional: Whether to display the start date on the event listing.

args.name: showEndDate
args.info: Optional: Whether to display the end date on the event listing.

args.name: showStartEndTime
args.info: Optional: Whether to display event start and end time on the event listing.

args.name: showTimezone
args.info: Optional: Whether to display the event timezone on the event listing.

args.name: showMap
args.info: Optional: Whether to display a map to the venue on the event listing.

args.name: showRemaining
args.info: Optional: Whether to display the number of remaining tickets.

args.name: showOrganizerFacebook
args.info: Optional: Whether to display a link to the organizer’s Facebook profile.

args.name: showOrganizerTwitter
args.info: Optional: Whether to display a link to the organizer’s Twitter profile.

args.name: showFacebookFriendsGoing
args.info: Optional: Whether to display which of the user’s Facebook friends are going.

args.name: terminology
args.info: Optional: Which terminology should be used to refer to the event (Valid choices are: tickets_vertical, or endurance_vertical).

blocks.name: getEventTicketClasses
blocks.description: Returns a response with a key of ticket_classes, containing a list of ticket_class.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: pos
args.info: Optional: Only return ticket classes valid for the given point of sale (Valid choices are: online, or at_the_door).

blocks.name: createEventTicketClass
blocks.description: Creates a new ticket class, returning the result as a ticket_class under the key ticket_class.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: name
args.info: Optional: Name of this ticket type.

args.name: description
args.info: Optional: Description of the ticket.

args.name: quantityTotal
args.info: Optional: Total available number of this ticket.

args.name: cost
args.info: Optional: Cost of the ticket (currently currency must match event currency) e.g. $45 would be ‘USD,4500’.

args.name: donation
args.info: Optional: Is this a donation? (user-supplied cost)

args.name: free
args.info: Optional: Is this a free ticket?

args.name: includeFee
args.info: Optional: Absorb the fee into the displayed cost.

args.name: splitFee
args.info: Optional: Absorb the payment fee, but show the eventbrite fee.

args.name: hideDescription
args.info: Optional: Hide the ticket description on the event page.

args.name: salesChannels
args.info: Optional: A list of all supported sales channels ([“online”], [“online”, “atd”], [“atd”]).

args.name: salesStart
args.info: Optional: When the ticket is available for sale (leave empty for ‘when event published’).

args.name: salesEnd
args.info: Optional: When the ticket stops being on sale (leave empty for ‘one hour before event start’).

args.name: salesStartAfter
args.info: Optional: The ID of another ticket class - when it sells out, this class will go on sale.

args.name: minimumQuantity
args.info: Optional: Minimum number per order.

args.name: autoHide
args.info: Optional: Hide this ticket when it is not on sale.

args.name: autoHideBefore
args.info: Optional: Override reveal date for auto-hide.

args.name: autoHideAfter
args.info: Optional: Override re-hide date for auto-hide.

args.name: hidden
args.info: Optional: Hide this ticket.

args.name: orderConfirmationMessage
args.info: Optional: Order message per ticket type.

blocks.name: getEventTicketClass
blocks.description: Gets and returns a single ticket_class by ID, as the key ticket_class.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: ticketClassId
args.info: Required: The ID of the ticket class.

blocks.name: updateEventTicketClass
blocks.description: Updates an existing ticket class, returning the updated result as a ticket_class under the key ticket_class.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: ticketClassId
args.info: Required: The ID of the ticket class.

args.name: name
args.info: Optional: Name of this ticket type.

args.name: description
args.info: Optional: Description of the ticket.

args.name: quantityTotal
args.info: Optional: Total available number of this ticket.

args.name: cost
args.info: Optional: Cost of the ticket (currently currency must match event currency) e.g. $45 would be ‘USD,4500’.

args.name: donation
args.info: Optional: Is this a donation? (user-supplied cost)

args.name: free
args.info: Optional: Is this a free ticket?

args.name: includeFee
args.info: Optional: Absorb the fee into the displayed cost.

args.name: splitFee
args.info: Optional: Absorb the payment fee, but show the eventbrite fee.

args.name: hideDescription
args.info: Optional: Hide the ticket description on the event page.

args.name: salesChannels
args.info: Optional: A list of all supported sales channels ([“online”], [“online”, “atd”], [“atd”]).

args.name: salesStart
args.info: Optional: When the ticket is available for sale (leave empty for ‘when event published’).

args.name: salesEnd
args.info: Optional: When the ticket stops being on sale (leave empty for ‘one hour before event start’).

args.name: salesStartAfter
args.info: Optional: The ID of another ticket class - when it sells out, this class will go on sale.

args.name: minimumQuantity
args.info: Optional: Minimum number per order.

args.name: autoHide
args.info: Optional: Hide this ticket when it is not on sale.

args.name: autoHideBefore
args.info: Optional: Override reveal date for auto-hide.

args.name: autoHideAfter
args.info: Optional: Override re-hide date for auto-hide.

args.name: hidden
args.info: Optional: Hide this ticket.

args.name: orderConfirmationMessage
args.info: Optional: Order message per ticket type.

blocks.name: deleteEventTicketClass
blocks.description: Deletes the ticket class. Returns {"deleted": true}.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: ticketClassId
args.info: Required: The ID of the ticket class.

blocks.name: addEventQuestion
blocks.description: Eventbrite allows event organizers to add custom questions that attendees fill out upon registration. This endpoint can be helpful for determining what custom information is collected and available per event.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: asOwner
args.info: Optional: Return private events and more details. True or false.

blocks.name: getEventAttendees
blocks.description: Returns a response with a key of attendees, containing a list of attendee.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: Limits results to either confirmed attendees or cancelled/refunded/etc. attendees (Valid choices are: attending, not_attending, or unpaid).

args.name: changedSince
args.info: Optional: Only return attendees changed on or after the time given.

args.name: lastItemSeen
args.info: Optional: Only return attendees changed on or after the time given and with an id bigger than last item seen.

blocks.name: getEventOrders
blocks.description: Returns a response with a key of orders, containing a list of order against this event.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: status
args.info: Optional: Filter to active (attending), inactive (not attending), or all (both) orders (Valid choices are: active, inactive, or all).

args.name: changedSince
args.info: Optional: Only return orders changed on or after the time given.

args.name: lastItemSeen
args.info: Optional: Only return orders changed on or after the time given and with an id bigger than last item seen.

args.name: onlyEmails
args.info: Optional: Only include orders placed by one of these emails.

args.name: excludeEmails
args.info: Optional: Don’t include orders placed by any of these emails.

blocks.name: getEventDiscounts
blocks.description: Returns a response with a key of discounts, containing a list of discounts available on this event.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

blocks.name: createEventDiscount
blocks.description: Returns a response with a key of discounts, containing a list of discounts available on this event.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: code
args.info: Required: Code used to activate discount.

args.name: amountOff
args.info: Optional: Fixed reduction amount.

args.name: percentOff
args.info: Optional: Percentage reduction.

args.name: ticketIds
args.info: Optional: IDs of tickets to limit discount to.

args.name: quantityAvailable
args.info: Optional: Number of discount uses.

args.name: startDate
args.info: Optional: Allow use from this date.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Optional: Allow use until this date.

blocks.name: getEventDiscount
blocks.description: Gets a discount by ID as the key discount.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: discountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the discount.

blocks.name: updateEventDiscount
blocks.description: Updates a discount; returns the result as a discount as the key discount.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: discountId
args.info: Required: The ID of the discount.

args.name: code
args.info: Required: Code used to activate discount.

args.name: amountOff
args.info: Optional: Fixed reduction amount.

args.name: percentOff
args.info: Optional: Percentage reduction.

args.name: ticketIds
args.info: Optional: IDs of tickets to limit discount to.

args.name: quantityAvailable
args.info: Optional: Number of discount uses.

args.name: startDate
args.info: Optional: Allow use from this date.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Optional: Allow use until this date.

blocks.name: getEventPublicDiscounts
blocks.description: Updates a discount; returns the result as a discount as the key discount.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

blocks.name: createEventPublicDiscount
blocks.description: Creates a new public discount; returns the result as a discount as the key discount.

args.name: token
args.info: Required: The OAuth token obtained from Eventbrite.

args.name: eventId
args.info: Required: The ID of the event.

args.name: code
args.info: Required: Code used to activate discount.

args.name: amountOff
